com.pedroalmir.athena.common.validation.annotation
Annotation Type ValidationMethod

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface ValidationMethod

Reports that the methods are annotated with this annotation validation methods

Author:
Pedro Oliveira

Optional Element Summary
 RestrictionElement[] restriction
          An array with the restrictions of the method validation
 TemporalExecution when
          In that time the method is executed against the method call controllers (Before, After, or Both)
 

restriction

public abstract RestrictionElement[] restriction
An array with the restrictions of the method validation

Returns:
restriction element
Default:
{}

when

public abstract TemporalExecution when
In that time the method is executed against the method call controllers (Before, After, or Both)

Returns:
temporal execution
Default:
com.pedroalmir.athena.common.validation.enums.TemporalExecution.BEFORE
